attributes.action: The BBC’s Royal Charter will not be renewed on the 31st December 2027.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC has shown that during the Referendum of 2016, the General Elections of 2017 and 2019, and the Corvid-19 pandemic that the BBC no longer produces unbiased reporting on key issues affecting the british public.
attributes.background: To refuse to renew the British Broadcasting Corporation’s Royal Charter thus cancelling their legal right to levy a License Fee on the British Public.
